page.title: 14 Farming around Otley
page.content:
Hall Farm Hall Farm has 200 acres and in that is grown barley,wheat and sugar beet.There are 4 tractors,1 digger,2 plough seeders and a sugar beeter.The owners keep some beef cattle.The normal pattern of rotation is undertaken.There is no pasture and the fields are large enough for modern machinery.
Bastings Hall Farm. This farm has 275 acres and the owners grow barley,wheat,rape and grass.There are 4 tractors,1 combine 2 ploughs and some cultivators.There are cattle and bullocks.The farm is 1200 years old. The normal pattern of rotation is undertaken.
